Lyric:
[by:NickyRomero]
[00:14.28]Would you stand by me?
[00:17.50]Or would you run away?
[00:20.81]I wanna keep you close
[00:24.03]Tell me what would it take
[00:26.93]
[00:27.40]When I’m in the dark
[00:30.66]And when our love is hardest
[00:33.43]When you see who my demons are
[00:36.78]If you knew my secrets
[00:40.48]
[00:40.80]Would you stand by me?
[00:43.93]Or would you run away?
[00:47.12]I wanna keep you close
[00:50.52]Tell me what would it take
[00:53.49]
[00:53.89]If I told you that I’ve lost my mind
[01:00.47]Would you stand by me?

[01:06.24]

[01:32.44]

[01:49.81]

[01:56.42]When you see who my demons are
[01:59.51]If you knew my deepest
